actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-188.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 262 - 133 (Record Vote No: 186).

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4169) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4169 (Executive departments appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill (H.R. 4169) making appropriations for the Departments of Commerce, Justice, and State, the Judiciary, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, and for other purposes.
